description: This course is designed to challenge pre-service teachers to use their knowledge, expertise and experience to design learning environments that will engage students in the learning process and cater for a variety of learning styles. This includes the application of principles and methods of curriculum development, implementation and assessment to chemistry; preparing curriculum materials and their rationales: observations of teaching.
prerequisites: Entry to the Graduate Diploma of Education (Secondary) or Bachelor of Education (Secondary) (Dual Degree) professional year.
